text: Manolo Fábregas (1921–1996) was a Spanish-born Mexican film actor.Mora p.125 He was from an established acting family. His grandmother was Virginia Fábregas while his mother was Fanny Schiller, with whom he appeared in the western film The Tiger of Jalisco in 1947. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
